camctrl.h File Reference

Include file for camera/view controller. More...

#include "camctrl.c"

Data Structures

struct  CAMCTRL
 Definition of a camera control. More...

Defines

#define CAMCTRL_ACTIVE
 This define can be evaluated to check if this module is included and active.
Configuration Data
The values of these parameters can be overwritten by defining them before including this file.

#define CAMCTRL_DEFLAYER   20
 default layer of view if CAMERA is not used
#define CAMCTRL_DEFDIST   -300
 default x distance of camera
#define CAMCTRL_DEFSPEED   5
 default movement speed of camera
#define CAMCTRL_DEFSMOOTHFAC   1.0
 default smoothing factor for camera movement
Constant Data
These constants are used as parameters for certain functions.

#define CAMCTRL_1STPERSON   0
#define CAMCTRL_CHASE   1
 follow entity with dist, auto adjust angle to entity angle.
#define CAMCTRL_FIXED   2
#define CAMCTRL_LOOKAT   3
#define CAMCTRL_FOLLOW   4
 follow entity with dist, no auto adjust of view angle.
#define CAMCTRL_INACTIVE   5
 camera control is inactive

Detailed Description

Include file for camera/view controller.

Define Documentation

#define CAMCTRL_CHASE   1

follow entity with dist, auto adjust angle to entity angle.

Required initialization calls:

  • CAMCTRL_setEntity()

Optional initialization calls:

  • CAMCTRL_setDist()
  • CAMCTRL_setAngle()

#define CAMCTRL_FOLLOW   4

follow entity with dist, no auto adjust of view angle.

Required initialization calls:

  • CAMCTRL_setEntity()

Optional initialization calls:

  • CAMCTRL_setDist()
  • CAMCTRL_setAngle()

Remove camera control.

Parameters:

void CAMCTRL_setAngle ( CAMCTRL *  psHandle,
ANGLE *  pangDir 
)

Set camera viewing angle offset.

Caution: When the given angle is changed somewhere else in the code, this will affect the camera. Can be used for additional effects.

Parameters:
psHandle Pointer to camera control
pangDir Pointer to offset angle

void CAMCTRL_setDist ( CAMCTRL *  psHandle,
VECTOR *  pvecDist 
)

Set camera distance to target position.

Caution: When the given vector is changed somewhere else in the code, this will affect the camera. Can be used for additional effects.

Parameters:
psHandle Pointer to camera control
pvecDist Pointer to distance vector

void CAMCTRL_setEntity ( CAMCTRL *  psHandle,
ENTITY *  pentFocus 
)

Attach Entity to camera control.

Parameters:
psHandle Pointer to camera control
pentFocus Pointer to entity focused by view

void CAMCTRL_setMode ( CAMCTRL *  psHandle,
var  vMode 
)

Set camera mode of camera control.

Parameters:
psHandle Pointer to camera control
vMode Camera mode (use predefined CAMCTRL_xxx camera modes)

void CAMCTRL_setPos ( CAMCTRL *  psHandle,
VECTOR *  pvecPos 
)

Set camera position to position given by vector.

Caution: When the given vector is changed somewhere else in the code, this will affect the camera. Can be used for additional effects.

Parameters:
psHandle Pointer to camera control
pvecPos Pointer to position vector

void CAMCTRL_setSmoothFac ( CAMCTRL *  psHandle,
var  vFac 
)

Set smoothing factor for camera movement.

Parameters:
psHandle Pointer to camera control
vFac Factor (0 slow change .. 1 fast change)

void CAMCTRL_setSpeed ( CAMCTRL *  psHandle,
var  vSpeed 
)

Set speed for camera movement.

Parameters:
psHandle Pointer to camera control
vSpeed Speed per tick

Show view of camera control .
